metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7313 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - negligible
metadata.Description:
LibTIFF allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memoryconsumption and crash) via a crafted tiff file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7313` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.1
libtiff-tools - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.1
libtiff5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.1
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.9-5ubuntu0.1').
